about_the_game:
Description:

Introducing the Winter's Gift Dice Pack, a charming addition to "Game Master Engine," offered as a complimentary DLC for our valued players. This unique set captures the essence of winter, enveloping your gaming sessions in the magic of the season.

Each die in this collection showcases exquisite designs inspired by the winter landscape. Picture dice that shimmer like a crisp, frosty morning or glint like icicles under the sun. The textures and colors reflect serene winter scenes, bringing an extra layer of immersion to your narratives.

The Winter's Gift Dice Pack is more than just visually appealing; it's designed to enhance your gaming with a dash of winter enchantment. Ideal for any setting, from a snow-covered fantasy land to a peaceful winter night's tale, these dice add a special touch to your tabletop adventures.

This pack is our way of saying thank you to our gaming community. Enjoy the wonder of winter in every roll with this delightful dice collection. Happy gaming!

Compatibility:

Requires the base game Game Master Engine.
An Internet connection is required for download and authentication.

name: Game Master Engine - Winter's Gift Dice Pack
short_description: Enhance your 3D virtual tabletop experience in Game Master Engine with the Free Dice Pack! This cosmetic DLC offers five sets of winter themed dice.
